newsitem.title: AUSTRALIA: RTRS-Australian Stocks to Watch Today - Nov 20.
newsitem.headline: RTRS-Australian Stocks to Watch Today - Nov 20.

text.p: Some Australian stocks to watch this morning:
* ANZ Banking Group Ltd ANZ.AX A$7.51 (unch)
ANZ is due to release its annual results at around 11.00 a.m. (0000 GMT) and is forecast to report a net profit before abnormals and after preferences of around A$1.05 billion.
* The Broken Hill Pty Co Ltd A$17.60 (-0.24)
* Santos Ltd A$5.09 (-0.06)
* Petroz NL A$0.82 (+0.03)

Phillips Petroleum Co has sent a letter of intent to Australia's Northern Territory government to build a A$1.9 billion onshore liquefied natural gas (LNG) plant in the Northern Territory, The Australian Financial Review newspaper reported on Wednesday. BHP, Petroz and Santos have significant stakes in the Undan side of the Undan-Bayu field in the Timor sea.
* The Broken Hill Pty Co Ltd A$17.60 (-0.24)

BHP said in its monthly production report late on Tuesday its oil/condensate production increased during October largely as a result of production from Liverpool Bay in the Irish Sea. It also said that copper output from its Escondida mine in Chile and the Magma Copper operations rose in the month of October but Papua New Guinea production fell.
* Coles Myer Ltd A$4.63 (-0.07)
Coles Myer Ltd, forecast a rejuvenation in its profit outlook at its annual meeting on Tuesday but failed to stop shareholders launching into a six-hour tirade aimed at Coles' directors.
QNI Ltd said on Tuesday he did not agree with market analysts' expectations of an improvement in nickel prices by the end of next year.
* Reinsurance Australia Corp Ltd A$4.29 (-0.01)

Reinsurance Australia Corp Ltd said on Tuesday it would establish a specialist catastrophe insurance vehicle capitalised at A$125 million. It said the new vehicle would be partly funded by a private placement of 15 million shares to existing institutional investors at A$4.06 per share to raise A$60.9 million.
* Highlands Gold NL A$0.56 (-0.01)
The Australian Mutual Society (AMP) said late on Tuesday it had lowered its stake in Papua New Guinean gold producer Highlands Gold NL to 5.88 percent from 7.49 percent previously.
* Qantas Airways Ltd A$1.97 (+0.04)
Qantas holds its annual meeting at 2.00 p.m. (0300 GMT) in Melbourne.
-- Sydney Newsroom 61-2 9373-1800
